testcase.name: Buyer negotiates the price for a product
testcase.system-out: Given the buyer is logged in QAE10_GR03_buyer@binar.com QJblfja5Cso=........passed And the user navigates to the product page..................................passed When the buyer clicks on the "Saya tertarik dan ingin nego" button..........passed And enters a negotiated offer price 3000000.................................passed And clicks the "Kirim" button...............................................passed Then the button becomes disabled and the button text becomes "Menunggu respon penjual".passed
